A technique combining the use of a bladed weapon and [[space–time ninjutsu]]. The user teleports to a marked target, with weapon in hand, to instantaneously deliver a swift, devastating slash to his opponent. Because of the speed of the technique's execution, not even an individual wielding the [[Sharingan]] — a dōjutsu capable of predicting movement — has enough reaction time to defend themselves against this technique, especially if the user is already physically fast.

In the anime, Tobirama used a marked kunai hidden with other thrown kunai, allowing him to attack a target that dodged his projectile attack.

== Trivia ==
* Despite using Space–Time Ninjutsu and weapons, the databook classifies this technique as [[taijutsu]].
